title: DirectX Error, tried everything. HELP

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: As soon as champ select ends and it goes to launch into the loading screen my game crashes and comes up with this error.  http://gyazo.com/71dcc3941c1b8d79d3d21d234472a5cd.  Please help i've tried a lot of thing nothing has seemed to work i've updated my drives re installed directX 11 4 times nothing is working. HELP

replies.body:
The boards support uploading of screenshots directly in them. Could you provide the screenshot via that method instead of using random links to unknown places? Or at least describe the message using text.

What OS are you on and who's your ISP?
Could you provide some information about your system such as Graphics card, drivers installed so on.
